Title*: Bandana Print Hooded Sherpa Fleece Jacket
Product description html:
Classic Bandana Style Meets Premium Comfort

This striking hooded sherpa fleece jacket features the iconic bandana paisley pattern in a sophisticated navy and cream colorway. The oversized silhouette and functional hood create a contemporary streetwear look while the plush fleece ensures all-day warmth. Full-zip closure provides versatile styling options.
Subtitle: Embrace classic Americana with this bandana print hooded sherpa fleece jacket. Featuring iconic paisley patterns in a sophisticated navy and cream colorway, this full-zip hooded jacket combines heritage streetwear aesthetics with premium fleece comfort. Perfect for collections targeting the streetwear and vintage fashion markets.
Tags: fleece, Sherpa Fleece Hoodie, Bandana Print, Paisley Pattern, Hooded Jacket, Streetwear, Winter Jacket, Men's Fleece
